features.featureTitle: Delete all existing content of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” code block provided by the user (full overwrite), preserving components, local seed data (`SWISS_DB`, `SHOWREEL`, `INITIAL_SALONS`, `PROFESSIONS`, `RICH_PRESETS`), Tailwind classes, imports, UI strings, and interaction logic as given.

Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V53 overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical adjustments required by this repository (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, unresolved identifiers, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports), without changing the intended V53 UI layout, styling, copy, or interaction behavior, including the five pillars: Olympus Intro showreel, native share via `navigator.share`, WhatsApp `wa.me` deep-link booking, Swiss smart location suggestions, and dark cinematic UI with trust badges.
